The medium is found to send Wolverine consciousness in a journey through time, towards the year 1970. There she occupies the Wolverine's body at the time, looking for the still young Xavier (James McAvoy) and Magneto (Michael Fassbender), that together , prevent this tragic future for mutants come true.
